abstract: More small businesses are finding there are advantages to setting up shop mostly or even entirely on Facebook, but there are also risks.
snippet: More small businesses are finding there are advantages to setting up shop mostly or even entirely on Facebook, but there are also risks.
lead_paragraph: In a small-business guide we’ve just published, Eilene Zimmerman reports that more small businesses are doing business mostly or even entirely on Facebook.

headline.main: Have You Tried Selling Goods on Facebook?
